title: Wasted Time
alt: Since it sounds like your time spent typing can't possibly be less productive than your time spent not typing, have you tried typing SLOWER?
transcript:
[Cueball holding his smartphone in both hands is talking to White Hat.]
Cueball: This new keyboard is like 30% faster! I'm never going back.[White hat replies and Cueball lifts his arms.]
White Hat: Good, put those years of horror behind you.
Cueball: C'mon. Sure, sometimes my focus on efficiency doesn't make sense. But we type a lot.[Cueball holding his smartphone in one hand while talking to White Hat.]
Cueball: That 30% improvement pretty quickly adds up to a huge amount of wasted time rescued.[White hat replies and Cueball lifts one arm.]
White Hat: I just watched you open Google News and then close it without reading it five times in a row.
Cueball: The fact that I spend most of my time so stupidly only makes it more important not to waste any here.
